record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, JULY 9, 2007, AT 2 P.M.

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate today, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the provisions of H. Con. Res. 179.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:51 p.m., adjourned until Monday, July 9, 2007, at 2 p.m.
